mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ht_borrow b INNER JOIN ht_borrow_bail bail ON b.borrow_nid = bail.borrow_nid WHERE b.`status`= 1 AND b.verify_status = 1 AND b.ontime > 0 AND b.ontime <= #{ontime}

SELECT b.id, b.user_id, i.`name` AS name, b.ontime, i.borrow_valid_time, b.borrow_nid, b.account, b.borrow_account_wait FROM ht_borrow b INNER JOIN ht_borrow_bail bail ON b.borrow_nid = bail.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_info i on i.id = b.id WHERE b.`status` = 1 AND b.verify_status = 3 AND b.is_engine_used = 0 AND b.ontime > 0 AND b.ontime <= #{ontime}
